title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally with support for Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and many others.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and first-class Pydantic models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, providing LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with multi-model conversations, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama with ActiveModel-style interface and Rails integrations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama with TUI model browser and GPU monitoring.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local LLM code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators and chat components.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes, Lambda, and edge devices.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for CPU and GPU (CUDA/ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain with Docker.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for Ollama with async/await and Combine publishers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI text generation and summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm optional features.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver SQL client integration that uses Ollama for natural-language-to-SQL.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync wrappers over Ollama’s REST API.
